#BlackMagicCraft #Episode170 #SATHOG

In this video I build my interpretation of Sathog the Flesh Spawn from Absolute Tabletop's Shadows Over Driftchapel "adventure kit". This was a rapid fire craft where I was on a very limited time constraint. This time constraint led to a liberating experience of rapid experimentation that led to some very cool results.

This video was NOT sponsored by Absolute Tabletop, I'm just a friend and fan. If you want to check out this adventure kit you can do so here:
https://absolutetabletop.com/shadows-over-driftchapel-adventure-kit-print-and-pdf

title: SATHOG the Flesh Spawn - Lovecraftian Terrain Build
